name: Battle Wrench
description: Big wrench. Looks painful.

name: Big Bucks Hammer
description: Odd hammer that makes the user rich.

name: Cubic Hammer
description: Powerful. Sharp corners. Delivers heavy damage.

name: Digi Hammer
description: High-tech hammer designed for efficient attack.

name: Drill Wrench
description: Wrench with a drill attached.

name: Frozen Tuna
description: Frozen like a rock. You can't eat it. Use it as a weapon.

name: Grade Zero
description: Rolls attack points all the way around to zero again.

name: Heavy Hammer
description: Battle hammer that packs a heavy wallop.

name: Kubera's Hand
description: Hammer in the shape of the god Kubera's hand.

name: LEGEND
description: Legendary hammer whose very existence was in doubt.

name: Poison Wrench
description: Wrench that can sting the enemy with poison.

name: Smash Wrench
description: Powerful wrench that smashes monsters to pieces.

name: Sigma Breaker
description: Highly functional weapon that splits the damage.

name: Stinger Wrench
description: Special wrench that can steal items from the enemy.

name: True Battle Wrench
description: The Battle Wrench, made easier to use in battle.

name: Turtle Shell Hammer
description: Hammer made from a turtle's shell.

name: Bell Trigger
description: Chaming gun made from a bell. Kind of cute, really.

name: Classic Gun
description: Light and easy to use.

name: Dark Viper
description: Sucks up and absorbs the effect of enemy attack.

name: Desperado
description: Vindictive machine gun bent on revenge.

name: Dryer Gun
description: Peculiar gun fashioned out of a hair dryer.

name: Grenade Launcher
description: Allows rapid fire of grenades. A little heavy.

name: Jurak Gun
description: Jurak's mystical gun. It's powerful, but a bit plain.

name: Last Resort
description: There's no tomorrow for whoever faces this one.

name: Magic Gun
description: Forms magic power in the atmosphere into bullets.

name: Question Shooter
description: Interrogates the enemy.

name: Sexy Panther
description: A sexy little number. Can't get enough of this one.

name: Sigma Bazooka
description: Bazooka that fires rocket bombs.

name: Soul Breaker
description: Legend says it can smash any living creature's soul.

name: Star Breaker
description: Its trademark is the destroyed star on its side.

name: Steal Gun
description: Steals enemy's items. Also called the "Thief Gun".

name: Supernova
description: Laser gun that burns as brightly as exploding stars.

name: Trumpet Gun
description: Gun made from a trumpet. What'll they think of next?

name: Twin Buster
description: A double-barreled gun. Twice the power?

name: Wild Cat
description: Cursed machine gun. Brings out the beast in its user.

name: Albatross
description: Spheda club. Good for long and curved shots.

name: Falcon
description: Spheda club. Good for long shots.

name: Flamingo
description: Spheda club. Good for medium range and curved shots.

name: Handy Stick
description: Just the right size for swinging. Good for Spheda?

name: Swan
description: Spheda club. Good for medium range shots.

name: Turkey
description: Spheda putter. Good for short distances.

name: 7 Branch Sword
description: Dug up from ancient ruins. Holds a mysterious power.

name: 7th Heaven
description: Beautifully ornate sword. He who sees it is captivated.

name: Ama no Murakumo
description: A sword among swords. The strongest of all?

name: Antique Sword
description: Ancient sword forged long ago.

name: Atlamillia Sword
description: Sword with the power of an Atlamillia.

name: Baselard
description: Big single-edged sword with long reach.

name: Bastard Sword
description: Strong double-edged sword.

name: Big Bang
description: Star-powered sword.

name: Bone Rapier
description: Sword made of bone. Its abilities are unknown.

name: Brave Ark
description: Legendary sword. All but forgotten.

name: Broad Sword
description: Broad, double-edged sword. Good attack power but heavy.

name: Choora
description: Short sword with a beautifully-patterned blade.

name: Chopper
description: Short, easy-to-handle sword.

name: Chronicle 2
description: Manipulates time. Surpasses even the Chronicle Sword.

name: Chronicle Sword
description: Manipulates time. Found between time and space.

name: Claymore
description: Large, double edged-sword. Heavy but powerful.

name: Cliff Knife
description: Short sword with hidden magic powers.

name: Cross Heinder
description: A treasured, double-edged sword with tremendous power.

name: Dark Cloud
description: Magic sword with the power of darkness.

name: Dark Excalibur
description: Evil sword that presides over everlasting darkness.

name: Drain Seeker
description: Demon sword born of a magic spell. Drains enemy power.

name: Dusack
description: Wieldy, single-edged sword with a unique design. Sharp.

name: Evilcise
description: Sword imbued with the power of an evil spirit.

name: Garayan Sword
description: Probably contains the spirit of Mardan Garayan.

name: Gladius
description: Light, one-handed sword. Relatively high attack.

name: Griffon Fork
description: Made from the feathers of a legendary monster.

name: Halloween Blade
description: Cute sword with a Halloween pumpkin design.

name: Holy Daedalus Blade
description: The sword Monica's father, King Raybrandt, left her.

name: Island King
description: Once used by the great ancient king, Kamehameha.

name: Kitchen Knife
description: Get good with this and you could be a super chef.

name: Lamb's Sword
description: Lamb: As gentle as a lamb? Looks weak, butâ€¦ Wolf: It looks thirsty for blood. It seems to have grown in power.

name: Long Sword
description: Monica's favorite. So-so attack, but easy to use.

name: Maneater
description: A sword that devours the souls of men.

name: Mardan Garayan
description: Definitely contains the spirit of Mardan Garayan.

name: Mardan Sword
description: Might contain the spirit of Mardan Garayan.

name: Muramasa
description: Famous sword crafted by great swordsmith Muramasa.

name: Royal Sword
description: Decorative sword with quite an edge.

name: Ruler's Sword
description: Sword once used by the legendary Aga.

name: Sand Breaker
description: Rare sword made from desert sand. Easily broken, though.

name: Sargatanas
description: Sword of darkness. Once owned by the god of death.

name: Sax
description: Single-edged sword that's easy to handle.

name: Serpent Slicer
description: A sword bathed crimson in the lifeblood of snakes.

name: Shamshir
description: Distinctive curved blade. Easy to handle.

name: Shining Bravado
description: Aborbs light and converts it into slashing power.

name: Small Sword
description: Small Japanese sword. Wieldy and devastatingly sharp.

name: Sun Sword
description: Darkness-slicing sword. Legendary.

name: Sword of Zeus
description: Sword of immeasurable power. Once used by the great god.

name: Tsukikage
description: A sword blessed by the power of moonlight.

name: Wise Owl Sword
description: Legendary sword made by the white-bearded owl's artisan.

name: Angel Shooter
description: Armband often worn by clergymen.

name: Athena's Armlet
description: Host to the blessed power of the goddess Athena.

name: Bandit Brassard
description: Lets you steal enemy's items in battle.

name: Crystal Brassard
description: Valuable armband made of rare crystal.

name: Destruction Brassard
description: Dark armband with the power to destroy all.

name: Five-Star Armlet
description: Made in the shape of the ancient royal house' crest.

name: Goddess Brassard
description: Armband blessed by a goddess.

name: Gold Brassard
description: A valuable brassard made of gold.

name: Love
description: Only those that truly understand love can wear it.

name: Magic Brassard
description: Magical armband.

name: Mobius Bangle
description: Absorbs power from infinite reaches of time and space.

name: Moon Armlet
description: Highly magical armlet made from the Moon Stone.

name: Platinum Brassard
description: Sturdy armband with strong magic.

name: Pocklekul
description: Magical armband made to honor the forest dwarves.

name: Satan Brassard
description: Armband said to have been forged by Satan.

name: Spirit Brassard
description: Phantom armband. Forged by spirits.

name: Star Armlet
description: Magical armlet that captures the stars' brightness.

name: Sun Armlet
description: Legendary armlet made of sunlight changed into metal.

name: Thorn Armlet
description: Armlet of woven thorns.
